title: University public lecture: The man who invented Christmas (University of Gloucestershire)
text: ( Source : University of Gloucestershire ) Professor Barry Davies is presenting a Christmas themed public lecture at the University of Gloucestershire on Wednesday 25 November . ' The man who invented Christmas' is inspired by L Frank Baum ,
